statements: DELETE FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE system_name = 'Communication System';
DELETE FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Engine Check' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE spacecraft_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine';
DELETE FROM system_components WHERE system_name = 'Navigation' AND last_maintenance_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM spacecraft_components WHERE component_type = 'engine' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PartsInventory WHERE location = 'Hangar 3' AND quantity < 5;
